title: Windows 95 - Brian Eno - The Microsoft Sound
description:
from the txt file:


==========================
The Microsoft Sound
by Brian Eno
==========================


Enhancements done to the original version include among others:
dual channels and full stereo restoration, addition of slight echo,
remastering in 24bit, downsampling to included formats.
Yes, all of this has been done from scratch (meaning: the source was
the original crappy low quality "The Microsoft Sound").






---------------------------------------------------------------

FILES INCLUDED

---------------------------------------------------------------


The Microsoft Sound

Format:     	PCM (WAVE)
Bitrate:    	176 kbps
Sampling: 	8 bit
Resolution:	22050 Hz
Channels:   	1

This is original "The Microsoft Sound" version,
exactly as it is included with every Windows 95 disc.
Yes, it is in MONO, low resolution and very low quality.
Created by Brian Eno in 1995 certainly in much better quality,
this version has been butchered by Microsoft and included exactly
as is on their Windows 95 CDs and floppy disks.



---------------------------------------------------------------


W95TMS-DS011121v4-CD

Format:     	PCM (WAVE)
Bitrate:    	1411 kbps
Sampling: 	16 bit
Resolution:	44100 Hz
Channels:   	2

Enhanced version "The Microsoft Sound" in CD-quality format.
This is downsampled version of W95TMS-DS011121v4-HQ.wav file.
Created by =DS= in 2001




---------------------------------------------------------------


W95TMS-DS011121v4-HQ

Format:     	PCM (WAVE)
Bitrate:    	4608 kbps
Sampling: 	24 bit
Resolution:	96000 Hz
Channels:   	2

"Original" of "The Microsoft Sound" enhanced version.
High quality format (if you want to play with it yourself,
use this one to work with).
Created by =DS= in 2001




---------------------------------------------------------------

W95TMS-DS011121v4-MP3CBR

Format:     	MP3 (MPEG-1 Layer III)
Bitrate:    	320 kbps CBR (Constant Bitrate)
Sampling: 	16 bit
Resolution:	44100 Hz
Channels:   	2

Enhanced version "The Microsoft Sound" in a CD-quality MP3 format.
This is CBR (Constant BitRate) version for those players and phones
that are not able to play VBR MP3s (like some crappy phones if you
were going to to use it as ringtone).
This is downsampled version of W95TMS-DS011121v4-HQ.wav file.
Created by =DS= in 2001



---------------------------------------------------------------

W95TMS-DS011121v4-MP3VBR

Format:     	MP3 (MPEG-1 Layer III)
Bitrate:    	320 kbps VBR (Variable Bitrate)
Sampling: 	16 bit
Resolution:	44100 Hz
Channels:   	2

Enhanced version "The Microsoft Sound" in a CD-quality MP3 format.
This is VBR (Variable BitRate) version, shich means it is very small
yet exactly the same quality as CBR version.
This is downsampled version of W95TMS-DS011121v4-HQ.wav file.
Created by =DS= in 2001



---------------------------------------------------------------
